metadata.title: CVE-2022-0534 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in htmldoc version 1.9.15 where the stackout-of-bounds read takes place in gif_get_code() and occurs when opening amalicious GIF file, which can result in a crash (segmentation fault).

criterions.comment: htmldoc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
